MajorClaims.MC1: government should not pay for the university fees
MajorClaims.MC2: government should provide those education to their people; however, for the more higher education like university, the students or their parents should pay for the fees

Claims.C1: this will encourage all the parents to think of the way to help their children to achieve more in their lives
Claims.C2: this will make both the parents and students in charge for their future themselves not just depend on the government to do all their responsibilities for them
Claims.C3: Some parents might not have enough money to pay for their children university fees
Claims.C4: I don't think it is also fair for the government as the government has been paying a lot of money for their students' primary and secondary education
Claims.C5: They will be more responsible with their studies when they pay the fees themselves

Premises.P1: they need to make some contribution too for their children future
Premises.P2: It is better for them to use the money to pay for the other students' education so that all people in their country could receive the same education
Premises.P3: students that already have a basic knowledge and education can get a part-time job and they can pay for their own studies when their parent could not afford to pay it
Premises.P4: the students will become more independent and it will build their characters in the marketplace as well
